venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
6:30-7:00pm - Food and Socializing

7:00-8:00pm - Presentations Begin

This month's meetup will be an open mic format.

Those in attendance will be able to sign-up to present during the food and socializing period.  They'll be spots for up to 10 presenters.  Depending on the number of presenters, each presenter will have 5 to 10 minutes.

As much as possible, I'd prefer demos of working software or code rather than slides.
item.name: July Meetup - Open Mic Night
